overview: “Walt Disney World is a tribute to the philosophy and the life of Walter Elias Disney”, those are the words spoken by his brother, Roy Disney at the opening of the Walt Disney World Resort.  To celebrate the 10th anniversary of Walt Disney World and the impact it has had on Florida, the Florida Disney Decade television special was created.  The special aired simultaneously on all three Orlando television stations on October 1, 1981.  The special includes Disney executives and Florida businessmen and politicians are interviewed about their roles in bringing Walt Disney World to Florida. Narrated by Gene Burne.
title: Florida's Disney Decade
